title: Everyman
description: Jeffrey Albertson’s comic hero comes to life on the big screen. Avery Mann absorbs the powers of comic book superheroes to protect the people of Gothamopolis.
quote: Don’t thank me. Thank Captain America for giving me the patriotism to want to save the President’s life.
altHero: Everyman on top of a mountain, cape blowing in the wind
alt1: Everyman sees a helicopter through a wall of fire
alt2: Avery Mann talks with a woman at a party
alt4: Everyman flying through the air eating a sandwich
